title: Champion rotation is missing a face
body:
Eve's face is missing.. and she isn't being invisible since her chest is still visible. Can you adjust the area of eve's splash being used so, we can see its eve, rather than a blue and purple mist? 

http://prntscr.com/b076qp

My screen shot link of what I'm seeing to referencing to again.

replies.body: Naw thats how it is supposed to be, you arnt supposed to see her!
its showing eves tits alone because thats the only reason you play her... like why else would be so nearly nude and so weak at the same time?

I actually found it really funny since the focus is her chest, and the same exact thing happens with her Tango skin. I always remind myself that Eve's Tango splash is the one where you don't know where to look.

Hiya! 

In the future, please report bugs in the Report a Bug section of the boards. :) It ensures they don't get lost! We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve it! ^-^
